definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: And prison sentences have become longer, he lamented.
sentences.chinese: 監獄刑期也變長了，他嘆道。

sentences.english: If accidents happened but you do not have a valid driver license, the punishment may reach to 10years.
sentences.chinese: 無照行駛發生車禍的話，刑期則更長，會長達10年。

sentences.english: Johnson urged politicians to increase sentences for people found guilty of gun crimes.
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜督促政治家提高對被判犯有槍支罪者的刑期。

sentences.english: Barry will cope with the sentence; he's done time before.
sentences.chinese: 巴里將能挺過這次刑期，他以前服過刑。

sentences.english: Cem is currently hiding out in France, avoiding a 23-year prison sentence back home.
sentences.chinese: 傑姆現在隱藏在法國，以逃避國內23年刑期。

sentences.english: A judge ordered the hotel heiress back to jail serving out her 45-day sentence.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定這位酒店繼承人重返監獄服完45天的刑期。

sentences.english: Hicks will serve the final seven months of his sentence in the south Australia state prison.
sentences.chinese: 希克斯將在澳洲南部監獄服滿他刑期的最後七個月。

sentences.english: According to another report, once convicted, they could face up to 5 years imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 另據報道，一旦定罪，這些人可能面臨最長5年刑期。

sentences.english: It has not yet decided if it will combine the prison terms for the two cases.
sentences.chinese: 不過，法院還會決定是否合併這兩個案件的刑期。

sentences.english: He was released from prison after serving a sentence of ten years.
sentences.chinese: 服滿十年刑期後，他從監獄裏被放出來。

sentences.english: Ehh, my sentence is coming, I want to handle it.
sentences.chinese: 呃，我的刑期快到了，我想處理一下。

sentences.english: The maximum penalty for industrial espionage is 7 years.
sentences.chinese: 商業間諜罪的最高刑期可達7年。

sentences.english: Lohan, 24, is due to start her jail term in Lynwood, California, today.
sentences.chinese: 24歲的羅漢今天開始在加州林伍德開始她的刑期。

sentences.english: She has just completed an 12- month jail sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她剛服完了一個月的刑期。

sentences.english: With these principles in mind, Obama should commute Pollard's sentence to time served.
sentences.chinese: 信守這一原則，奧巴馬應該改判波拉德的刑期。

sentences.english: His term of imprisonment hasn't expired yet.

definition: to reduce penalty/shortened or commuted (judicial) sentence
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
to assess punishment/to determine the sentence (on a criminal)
limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)
to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
